attributes.action: Remove cigarette sales to adult venues only.  e.g.  Pubs; Chemists; Off Licences, etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is insane that the biggest killer drug in the world is sold in high street shops alongside sweets and comics !
Drug pushing is supposed to be illegal -yet the government allows and profits from this tacit brainwashing of children that cigarettes are a normal, harmless, everyday purchase.    Result; Yet another generation of drug addicted NHS customers.
Cigarette sales must be moved to adult venues only.
Pubs; Chemist; Off Licence; etc
